<class name="AbstractDifferentiableUnivariateSolver" extends="BaseAbstractUnivariateSolver" startLine="24">
* Provide a default implementation for several functions useful to generic * solvers. 3.0 $Id: AbstractDifferentiableUnivariateSolver.java 1455194 2013-03-11 15:45:54Z luc $ as of 3.1, replaced by {@link AbstractUnivariateDifferentiableSolver}
* Derivative of the function to solve.
* Construct a solver with given absolute accuracy. absoluteAccuracy Maximum absolute error.
* Construct a solver with given accuracies. relativeAccuracy Maximum relative error. absoluteAccuracy Maximum absolute error. functionValueAccuracy Maximum function value error.
* Compute the objective function value. point Point at which the objective function must be evaluated. the objective function value at specified point. TooManyEvaluationsException if the maximal number of evaluations is exceeded.
* {@inheritDoc}
